name: Quip Anomaly
description: Quip Anomaly is a deep space dodge 'em up game. Guide Virnu to dodge hazards, acquire research, and obtain power ups. As you unlock each level, you will learn more about Virnu and her story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Service Pack 1 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU 2.33 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440 DirectX: Version 11
